About.preview: (click on the thumbnails to see the full illustration)
About.line1: My name is Guilherme, I am 26 years old and I live in São Paulo, Brazil. I currently work as a Front-end Developer, but I also have experience in Design and Illustration.
About.line2: Between 2020 and 2023, I worked on illustration projects, creating game art and original characters.
About.line3: In addition to illustrations, I also work on Web and Mobile app development, creating prototypes in Figma and Photoshop to deliver functional and well-crafted interfaces.
About.line4: I enjoy learning new techniques, exploring creativity, and combining development and design in a way that makes sense in practice.
About.line5: Feel free to reach out to me, whether for professional matters or just to have a chat :)
